english: tofu; bean curd; soybean curd; tofu dish

etymology.interpretation: Literally ‘bean-curdled,’ referring to soybeans processed into soft curds; by extension it names both the ingredient and dishes made from it.

examples.chinese: 我今天买了新鲜的豆腐(我今天買了新鮮的豆腐)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ jīntiān mǎi le xīnxiān de dòufu.

examples.chinese: 这道麻婆豆腐很下饭(這道麻婆豆腐很下飯)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè dào Mápó dòufu hěn xiàfàn.
examples.english: This mapo tofu goes great with rice.

examples.chinese: 豆腐用黄豆制成，口感细嫩(豆腐用黃豆製成，口感細嫩)。
examples.pinyin: Dòufu yòng huángdòu zhìchéng, kǒugǎn xìnèn.
examples.english: Tofu is made from soybeans and has a delicate texture.
